title: I need help pls
body:
Hi everyone,
Well I haven't played League in three weeks because I was on vacation, but when I finally tried to log in, I couldn't, my account is permanently banned.
So I tried to check my e-mail and my e-mail doesn't exist, it is hacked and deleted and my League account is also hacked.
I was shocked so I checked my account on lolking.net so, someone else was using my account from 3/24 to 4/2.
Today I have asked support.riotgames.com for help but whenever I posted my problem and after I wanted to see that post if someone answered, that post didn't existed.
more precisley it said: 
The page you were looking for doesn't exist

You may have mistyped the address or the page may have moved

Please answer me, need help

replies.body: Due to the nature of sensitive account info, this isn't something we can help with on the boards.  We can assist with this individually and offer more context in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Hit us up through there and our player behavior team will get back to you as soon as possible.  Hang tight!
